# FactoryMethods.CodeSpan Method

Creates a new instance of [MdCodeSpan](../../MdCodeSpan/index.md)

```csharp
public static MdCodeSpan CodeSpan(string text);
```

## Parameters

The content of the code span. The value will not be escaped.
